title: the new HUD
body:
so I've noticed a lot of mixed feelings about the new hud and i personally hate it. i feel there should, at least, be a way to choose which hud you wan't, you shouldn't be forced to play on that hud. 
this is the kind of things that make players no longer want to play the game. riot, listen to your community, a lot of them want the old hud back

replies.body: Yep so bad, I want the old one back
I agree its garbage, let me choose to use the old hud
